body.name: Tri-Fold Memory Foam Mattress, 4 inch Single Folding Mattress with Collapsible and Washable Cover, Travel and Guest Mat, 75"×25"×4", Grey
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 19 hrs 38 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Tri-fold Memory Foam Mattress: Our tri-fold memory foam mattress is the perfect solution to the temporary sleeping. This also be useful when there is no place for an unexpected guest comes into your home need to stay overnight. And the strong support, perfect fit with the body, not easy to deformation, portable use.

Applicable to a Variety of Situations: Plus, the tri-fold mattress can be folded up and carried. When folded up, it can be used as a cushion, which can be stored anywhere, practical and space-saving. You can also take it outside and use it as a picnic mat because it's washable, so you don't have to worry about getting dirty.

Premium Structure: The foldable mattress consist of 1.5" Gel AeroFusion Memory Foam and 2.5" Flex Support Base Foam. The gel memory foam allows you to adjust your temperature when you lie on it, and it gives you a cool feeling. Effectively distribute your pressure points. The Support Base Foam has strong support to ensure that the body is separated from the floor and does not feel wet, giving you an extreme sleep experience.

Easy to Use and Store: It is made up of three separate pieces of memory foam mattress, which is very convenient to move and carry. It unfolds or folds in seconds. When not in use, it is easily placed in small space such as cabinets for storage.

Certification of CertiPUR-US: The durability, performance and content of the memory foam we used, free of unhealthy chemicals are all certified by CertiPUR-US in the United States, with very high standards that you can buy with confidence.
body.description: A foldable portable Tri-fold Topper that can be used for indoor flooring and outdoor activities. And easy to use, easy to store and save space.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Every layer is designed to provide a more comfortable experience
Easy to use and convenient storage
Can be used in many situations in your life

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this folding mattress to use when going to visit family who doesn't have enough beds when we all come to visit. In the past I tried blow up mattresses which were ok but not all that comfortable and would sometimes deflate while in use.This was a HUGE improvement! It unfolded easily, and was a great size - I bought the Twin XL which gave lots of room for me to move around and not feel like I was going to go off the edge. I love the fact that it comes with a case to help carry it around. It feels like it is good quality and will last, too. Most importantly, I slept normally - it was quite comfortable. I was able to catch a good sale so I completely feel that I made a good purchase! I would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best value and most comfortable in side-by-side comparison!
reviews.reviewText: I'm setting up a Prius Prime as a "micro RV", and need to be able to sleep comfortably. I am past the age when I can comfortably sleep on even a high quality camp pad, and if I can't comfortably sleep, the rest of the plan doesn't work.I ordered three 75"x 25" 4" trifold mattresses and slept on each for 1 night. None of them were horrible, but this one seemed more comfortable.Then I put all three next to each other, and sat/laid down on each.I could feel the floor through all the others I, but *not* through this one.This one is solid enough that I can't feel the hard surface below it, and soft enough that I don't get back pain or hot spots (Both of which happen when I try to sleep on a regular camping pad or inflatable mattress).Interestingly, this one is also the *least* expensive!Also, this is the only one that came with a handy carrying case! I had resigned myself to sewing my own, but no need!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty darn good
reviews.reviewText: Pretty darn good. Got it on sale during a Black Friday thing. It’s comfy, the cover is soft. I like that the cover is removable, making for easy washing. For kids, a disposable waterproof pad(like the ones used for potty training dogs) could easily be slipped inside. Lots of pics in my review, here are thoughts:Came rolled up and compressed. Immediately began expanding upon opening, a good sign. I removed the foam to help the process go faster, so that the edges and corners weren’t slowed by the cover. The cover was easy to put back on, but is not loose or baggy at all.The foam inside has two layers. A higher density white foam on the bottom and a softer blue foam on the top. All in all, quite comfortable to lay on.The length and width are spot on to the advertised measurements. Part of my 4-star rating came from the thickness. This is advertised as a 4” thick pad, and it only is 3.5”. If you’re wondering if half an inch really would make much more of a difference, talk to any man you know ;-). Not enough to send it back, but really not accurate.The other reason for the 4-star is that it lacks any Velcro straps to hold it closed when folded. These would make it easier to store and carry. It didn’t advertise this, but they’re on all other tri-folds I’ve used and would make handling easier.All in all a very good pad. 4 stars, but the two things I mentioned are minor to most people. I would recommend this pad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice. Tucks in Corner of Room for Easy Storage. Worth the Money.
reviews.reviewText: I'm very pleased with the folding mattress. Comfortable. It's easy to store in the corner of the bedroom for visitors. I also got a folding metal frame to go with it. I'm all set for visitors. Worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for parents and kids
reviews.reviewText: Got this after my husband had to sleep on the floor next to my daughter's toddler bed one night. It's a nice thickness and very easy to fold up. We even let my toddler lay on it folded up when relaxing in front of the TV for a little. We think this would also be great to travel with - more comfortable than an air mattress although not as compact, or to have as an option when you have a lot of younger guests sleeping over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, but a bit narrow
reviews.reviewText: Surprisingly comfortable for being only 4” thick. It came with its own case, rather cheaply made. We bought it bundled with another case and fitted sheet. Even though it came with a case, the other case in the bundle was much better made. Their own fitted sheet is a good idea, because this mattress is only 25” wide, much narrower than a twin bed 38”. The narrow width does make it a bit tricky to turn over without rolling off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mattress. Highly recommended !
reviews.reviewText: So comfy, soft, great little mattress. No scents which is wonderful, I'm so happy with my purchase. Perfect mattress and perfect seller. I'll buy again! I highly recommend people to buy this great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars exactly what I was looking for!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a foldable solution for a sunny napping area and didn't want to go for an entire bed. This is deep enough & firm enough, even for a side sleeper on hardwood floors! And it folds neatly into a nearby closet! My husband suggested it for camping or RV use too! I'm not sure if it's thick enough or be comfortable enough to support a large person, but if you're average size & don't need/want something more permanent this is an excellent choice. It's also suggested as a topper, but it could be used by itself on a platform bed too. Very happy with my purchase!

No se ve como en las fotos para poder ponerlo como sillón se sentiría muy frágil pero como su función de colchón si es suficiente cómodo para poder dormir, lo puse en una base plegable queen y quedó perfecto
